{"aid":205048855,"attribute":0,"cid":323096613,"copyright":1,"ctime":1618203655,"desc":"你们是我不停旋转的动力，让我坚信可以挣脱束缚，奔向属于我的七彩云。

监制：人形兎","dimension":{"height":1080,"rotate":0,"width":1920},"duration":208,"dynamic":"#乐正绫0412生日快乐# 或许我们每个人都会是那只褪去华丽外衣的丑马，但是依旧有人喜欢你的真实、你的独特，认为你是彩色木马中最闪耀的那一个。
旋转木马虽然总在不停地追逐，永远隔着不变的距离，但我知道，每当我回头看，就会发现你们一直都在那里支持着我。你们是我不停旋转的动力，让我坚信可以挣脱束缚，奔向属于我的七彩云。

插播一条小惊喜：大家期待已久的阿绫V5声库制作也接近尾声了，我们会在近期公开测试版的试用，详细规则会在之后放出，请大家继续关注哦~","jump_url":"bilibili://video/205048855/?page=1&player_preload=null&player_width=1920&player_height=1080&player_rotate=0","owner":{"face":"https://i1.hdslb.com/bfs/face/be9e03521ccd9ef768dfa344e498bcb91dac3b83.jpg","mid":406948651,"name":"乐正绫"},"pic":"https://i1.hdslb.com/bfs/archive/3933673ca786101e752f8305d2edffbcb117f4cb.jpg","player_info":null,"pubdate":1618221605,"rights":{"autoplay":1,"bp":0,"download":0,"elec":0,"hd5":1,"is_cooperation":1,"movie":0,"no_background":0,"no_reprint":1,"pay":0,"ugc_pay":0,"ugc_pay_preview":0},"share_subtitle":"已观看50.0万次","short_link":"https://bili2233.cn/BV1Wh411U7Jg","short_link_v2":"https://bili2233.cn/BV1Wh411U7Jg","stat":{"aid":205048855,"coin":29241,"danmaku":2951,"dislike":0,"favorite":26529,"his_rank":0,"like":41663,"now_rank":0,"reply":4576,"share":3599,"view":506136},"state":0,"tid":30,"title":"【乐正绫原创曲】丑马","tname":"VOCALOID·UTAU","videos":1}

"{"aid":379513231,"attribute":0,"cid":454036062,"copyright":1,"ctime":1638543013,"desc":"“没用的回忆增加了。”\n——STAFF——\n◇作词：萤失Hinano\n◇作曲：萤失Hinano\n◇编曲：萤失Hinano\n◇演唱：\n（VOCALOID本家）洛天依·乐正绫\n（人声本家）萤失Hinano\n◇调声：桂月锁心\n◇混音：萤失Hinano\n◇曲绘：一树羊羊streep\n◇映象：JAM\n\n——————\n很高兴能和各位神仙一起合作这首南北组V5曲！！桂月月的调教羊羊老师的曲绘和果酱的PV都太神太神了！！主歌的天依用的是V4萌，也谢谢桂月月特别的设计给这首歌拉出了一种时间跨度的感觉，好像关于“我和她”的故","dimension":{"height":1080,"rotate":0,"width":1920},"duration":205,"dynamic":"很高兴能和各位神仙一起合作这首南北组V5曲！桂月月的调教羊羊老师的曲绘和果酱的PV都太神太神了！主歌的天依用的是V4萌，也谢谢桂月月特别的设计给这首歌拉出了一种时间跨度的感觉，好像关于“我和她”的故事，真的由南北组在平行时空HE了一样——\n我仍然记得，故事开始的那一天，我和她带着相机坐在公园长椅上，抬头看见漫天的粉紫夕暮。\n“没用的回忆增加了——”\n“为什么说是没用的回忆？”\n“嗯..因为人生就是由很多没用的回忆组成的。”\n“是这样，但这并不是没用的回忆。”","first_frame":"https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/storyff\/n211203a21kuhrm2ymjoxwdg1n42dq2z_firsti.jpg","jump_url":"bilibili:\/\/video\/379513231\/?page=1&player_preload=null&player_width=1920&player_height=1080&player_rotate=0","mission_id":209938,"owner":{"face":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/48589a60d5cf32d9e156e5a4e26b4c4764e90dbe.jpg","mid":567708,"name":"萤失Hinano"},"pic":"https:\/\/i2.hdslb.com\/bfs\/archive\/a2aab9cd0cbdcb762be0500db5654e29a762599b.jpg","player_info":null,"pubdate":1638549317,"rights":{"autoplay":1,"bp":0,"download":0,"elec":0,"hd5":0,"is_cooperation":1,"movie":0,"no_background":0,"no_reprint":1,"pay":0,"ugc_pay":0,"ugc_pay_preview":0},"short_link":"https:\/\/bili2233.cn\/BV12f4y1K7fd","short_link_v2":"https:\/\/bili2233.cn\/BV12f4y1K7fd","stat":{"aid":379513231,"coin":3010,"danmaku":59,"dislike":0,"favorite":4106,"his_rank":0,"like":4896,"now_rank":0,"reply":527,"share":261,"view":27888},"state":0,"tid":30,"title":"【洛天依x乐正绫原创曲\/V5】没用的回忆增加了【萤失Hinano\/桂月锁心】“将每一秒镌刻 406948651, "content": "#乐正绫# 任时光流转，我会一直在这里，等你再一次听我唱歌[乐正绫_我可以]", "ctrl": "", "orig_dy_id": 597638205257173639, "pre_dy_id": 597638205257173639, "timestamp": 1638180424, "reply": 75, "orig_type": 8 }, "origin": "{\"aid\":336994075,\"attribute\":0,\"cid\":449866761,\"copyright\":1,\"ctime\":1637986888,\"desc\":\"1.描写的是过气p主和过气歌姬隔着电脑大眼瞪小眼的日常。\\r\\n2.是“鸽”的一种比较文雅的说法。但是这描述的心路历程也不全是编的，你要信我。\\r\\n3.你们都以为我搞的v5，但是其实是绫5和洛4搭出来的南北。在调声方面花了比较久以至于我都想加个《爆肝xx小时！》的标题。\\r\\n4.然后看看自己上次投稿时间以及…以及游戏的时长，总之是没好意思。但是你就说她俩唱的好不好吧！她真的我真的，这谁顶得住啊。\\r\\n6.总之失去了做个pv的热情，你们懂我。既然字幕在v4编辑器里，你就当是洛和绫在吐露心声吧。\",\"dimension\":{\"height\":1080,\"rotate\":0,\"width\":1920},\"duration\":239,\"dynamic\":\"\",\"first_frame\":\"https:\\\/\\\/i2.hdslb.com\\\/bfs\\\/storyff\\\/n21112714p0lo9rlaqce63tmo8752cqb_firsti.jpg\",\"jump_url\":\"bilibili:\\\/\\\/video\\\/336994075\\\/?page=1&player_preload=null&player_width=1920&player_height=1080&player_rotate=0\",\"owner\":{\"face\":\"https:\\\/\\\/i1.hdslb.com\\\/bfs\\\/face\\\/2e25812e0ba75174c07fe9b61e68e20c66e89499.jpg\",\"mid\":3379951,\"name\":\"ilem\"},\"pic\":\"https:\\\/\\\/i2.hdslb.com\\\/bfs\\\/archive\\\/908ef40f8e159fc24950fe6fb4779a5befc0899c.png\",\"player_info\":null,\"pubdate\":1637986888,\"rights\":{\"autoplay\":1,\"bp\":0,\"download\":0,\"elec\":0,\"hd5\":0,\"is_cooperation\":0,\"movie\":0,\"no_background\":0,\"no_reprint\":1,\"pay\":0,\"ugc_pay\":0,\"ugc_pay_preview\":0},\"share_subtitle\":\"已观看93.0万次\",\"short_link\":\"https:\\\/\\\/bili2233.cn\\\/BV1WR4y147x4\",\"short_link_v2\":\"https:\\\/\\\/bili2233.cn\\\/BV1WR4y147x4\",\"stat\":{\"aid\":336994075,\"coin\":109839,\"danmaku\":2277,\"dislike\":0,\"favorite\":61312,\"his_rank\":18,\"like\":128844,\"now_rank\":0,\"reply\":8100,\"share\":13788,\"view\":937712},\"state\":0,\"tid\":30,\"title\":\"洛天依 {"aid":591828049,"attribute":0,"cid":445386557,"copyright":1,"ctime":1637343889,"desc":"酒精微醺，甜蜜着迷，心动沦陷就像咬下一口酒心巧克力。 
 
————Staff————
作词：纪远
作曲：LS
调校：Creuzer
曲绘：---ACR，KIKI_STARK，Mirror酱_
PV：Kin_en","dimension":{"height":1080,"rotate":0,"width":1920},"duration":289,"dynamic":"#乐正绫# 
还记得那一天，无法克制的心跳悸动吗？
微醺着迷、甜蜜沦陷，甘愿落入温柔陷阱。
美味酒心在唇齿间四溢，炽热的心意难以掩藏。
《酒心吻》的味道，一口就甜度饱和；喜欢的心情，我想唱给你听。","first_frame":"https://i2.hdslb.com/bfs/storyff/n211120a2184viorqq1ueh3mbyarq8xk_firsti.jpg","jump_url":"bilibili://video/591828049/?page=1&player_preload=null&player_width=1920&player_height=1080&player_rotate=0","owner":{"face":"https://i1.hdslb.com/bfs/face/be9e03521ccd9ef768dfa344e498bcb91dac3b83.jpg","mid":406948651,"name":"乐正绫"},"pic":"https://i2.hdslb.com/bfs/archive/77caf652e056b78229accb083f0f95f5524b5746.jpg","player_info":null,"pubdate":1637380805,"rights":{"autoplay":1,"bp":0,"download":0,"elec":0,"hd5":1,"is_cooperation":1,"movie":0,"no_background":0,"no_reprint":1,"pay":0,"ugc_pay":0,"ugc_pay_preview":0},"share_subtitle":"已观看23.0万次","short_link":"https://bili2233.cn/BV1Sq4y167Rj","short_link_v2":"https://bili2233.cn/BV1Sq4y167Rj","stat":{"aid":591828049,"coin":15019,"danmaku":709,"dislike":0,"favorite":17239,"his_rank":0,"like":24942,"now_rank":0,"reply":1973,"share":1841,"view":235670},"state":0,"tid":30,"title":"【乐正绫原创曲】酒心吻【EP《告白诗》收录曲】","tname":"VOCALOID·UTAU","videos":1}
